Reviews.Title: Best cell phone ever
Reviews.Author: Peter Labusohr
Reviews.Content: I think the Mototrola v325i cell phone is by far the best cell phone I have ever owned. Completely reliable,ruggedized for those dropped phone moments,user friendly. I have been eligible for new phones over the years and bought this phone to replace the one I had for 6 years rather than accept a new phone from verizon. Once I left my phone on top of the car and it took a 30 mile ride before falling off in the middle of busy Montauk Hwy. It was run over at least once. A friendly stranger found it on the road and called one of my contact numbers,who went and got it for me. The phone continued operating perfectly for another year.  If they only made ALL electronic devices so well.
